text:
@jdawsey1 You know who doesn't have #coronavirus? The other Romney, who was barred from attending CPAC where Ronna likely contracting it. Barred for not selling his soul to the fascist in the WH. 

I sincerely hope this is a wake up call for her and other Trump minions.
